attrib.italic: aANOVA test, bChi-square test; cKruskal–Wallis H-test; *compared with HC group, p < 0.05; **compared with HC group, p < 0.001; †compared with SCD group, p < 0.05; ‡compared with SCD group, p < 0.001. MMSE, Mini-Mental State Examination. ACE-III, Addenbrooke’s Cognitive Examination. MoCA-B, Montreal Cognitive Assessment-Basic. AVLT, Auditory Verbal Learning Test. BVMT, Brief Visuospatial Memory Test. AFT, Animal Verbal Fluency Test. BNT, Boston Naming Test. STT, Shape Trail Test. ST, Silhouettes Test. JLO, Judgment of Line Orientation. DST, Digit Span Test.
